content.content: We have a guide for editors, and a guide for authors is WIP. How about a guide for people that read EIPs? It would contain stuff like “only final EIPs should be used”, and brief descriptions of each of the sections.
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing the creation of a guide for readers of EIPs, which would contain information on how to use EIPs and brief descriptions of each section. The proposal is explained in detail, and the author is open to feedback and suggestions. A third party could provide constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: I think this is a good idea. Another thing: while reading an EIP, check the discussion thread for debate that leads to this final version for more awareness
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
